summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Forward Thrust Park Plan and Program; making determinations pursuant to Section 5 of King County Resolution 34571 that certain projects set forth in Section 3 of said Resolution are impractical to substantially accomplish and abandoning such projects and authorizing allocation of Bond proceeds made available by abandonment of impractical projects, along with other associated funds, to the completion, expansion, enlargement, extension or additional development of other projects set forth and authorized in Section 3 of King County Resolution 34571.
